title: Serious Ranked 5's Team Looking for Dedicated Top Laner and Support
body:
**(At the moment, I want divisions Gold and above, but I will accept applicants Silver 2 and up if they prove themselves.)**

**Information:**
Hello, I’m Jared (DarkCloud360) and I’m attempting to put together a winning team. I had a previous team, but due to disputes involving schedules two members have parted ways leaving us to fill their spots. 

**What is expected from Top Lane:**
We want you to play Meta picks like:{{champion:57}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:68}}    , but you can have pocket picks like:{{champion:58}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:24}}    . We are looking for a person that is confident in their position and knows how to handle themselves in tough situations as well as cooperate and talk with fellow team members. We would like someone who enjoys the top lane and does not want to switch positions since top lane is the only one we are looking to fill at the moment. We like to joke and have fun while playing and would love if you were funny and have a sense of humor to help the team communicate and stay close to work as best together as we can. I know these are a lot, but if you meet these prerequisites we would love for you to tryout.

**Support**
Looking for a dedicated player that knows a lot about warding, shot-calling, and laning. Also looking for an experienced players and can adjust to an ADCs play.

**Also comment down below/tell me in game:**
What are your strengths:
What are your weaknesses:
What your champion pool is
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's:
Will you be dedicated to a Team:
What you can bring to a Team:

**Practice Times and Voice Comms**
The schedule for practice is: Monday-Friday: 8pm-12am EST. Saturday and Sunday we will play if everyone is on for a few hours, but we may have a tournament on Saturdays also. 

**Skype is required**

**Closing**
I really hope to hear from anyone that can fit in with these practice times. Thank you for reading this long post. I just want to make sure I gave you a feel for what our team is looking for and what we expect from a potential Top Laner. Thank you!

replies.body:
ign: k1ll3rd3th 
if you want to see my strengths play with me 
champion pool : any champ you need 
i am interested in winning 
i am dedicated 
i can bring myself to the team
i play any role
{{summoner:30}} {{item:1001}}

What are your strengths: Warding, shot-calling, objective control
What are your weaknesses: Champ select knowledge (i.e. synergy and counter-pick knowledge)
What your champion pool is: Leona, Alistar, Blitzcrank, Sona
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: I am interested in seeing how good I can be
Will you be dedicated to a Team: Yes
What you can bring to a Team: Hard work and a positive attitude

What are your strengths: Flexibility
What are your weaknesses: N/A
What your champion pool is: Thresh, Janna, Sona, Taric, Soraka, Blitz, Morg, Annie
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: Want to make gaming a profession someday
Will you be dedicated to a Team: Yes
What you can bring to a Team: Game Knowledge and Leadership skills

Ign: Skillkapped

Diamond 5 (I am a package deal with a top laner, we must both be accepted or neither of us if interested.)

Thanks

What are your strengths: team fighting, can take  control of a game and snowball the adc 
What are your weaknesses: killing wards 
What your champion pool is: i don't limit my champion pool i can play whatever the team needs, my power picks are annie support nami, blitz
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: looking for a fun active team to play with, get better and improve 
Will you be dedicated to a Team: yeah i think i could be a  good addition 
What you can bring to a Team: i can bring good shot calling and overall map pressure and game controll

ign: Regalian Knight
What are your strengths: Good Pressure in lane, focuses on team fight potential
What are your weaknesses: better communicating through skype, hard to ping due to the fact I play on a tracpad.
What your champion pool is: {{champion:266}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:122}}  learning gnar currently.
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: Looking to improve myself better as a player and see how far I can go.
Will you be dedicated to a Team: If the team is as dedicated as I hope, you have my attention practice and all games.
What you can bring to a Team: I bring positive attitude and always looks for a way to make the team focus on objectives.
What ranking are you looking for?
